channel.title: Command problem
channel.description:
Hello guys,
I have a problem. When I type as command ::ikbenpure5 or whatever I put after :: works like noclip. So everyone who fills in a wrong command can walk trough walls... Please does anyone know how to fix this? :s
Thanks in advance! ikbenpure5
